document_data.mainbody:
rommors Fang was a rocky island in the Sea of Fallen Stars.
It was tall, rocky, and had few trees, sitting half the Sea of Fallen Stars from Veltalar.
The Simbul liked to hurl her most destructive magics and stargaze at Crommors fang. On the ,The date in the book is wrong due to editing error see web cite she spell-battled Elminster Aumar there.
